I encountered the same "Unauthorized error" when attempting to retrieve all games. This suggests a broader access issue with retrieving game-related data from the API at this time.

answer_generation.query: I want to know the details of the game with ID 12345. Give me the date, home team, home team score, visitor team, and visitor team score. Additionally, provide the player statistics for this game.
